comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content:
Arch Hoxsey     Aero Club of America Pilot #21.  Flight with Roosevelt occurred 
October 11,1910, aviation meet   Kinloch, Missouri. Aircraft was the Wright Brothers model B prototype, a Wright Brothers Model A with dual forward elevating planes (canards) removed 
(sometimes referred to as "Headless") and wheels added. Retained aft mounted combination fixed horizontal stabilizer and warping elevator.
